Title: Men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1953 rose-gold chronograph watch DGS00063/06
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1953 rose-gold chronograph watch DGS00063/06 RRP £550.00 Now £325.00 Description Part of the timeless 1953 collection, this Swiss-made men’s Dreyfuss & Co. chronograph watch features rose gold plated detailing and chronograph functions. Its stainless steel case is surrounded by rich tones of rose gold plating, complementing the black genuine leather strap, which is securely fastened with a push button clasp. A classic design, the cream watch face has three black subdials within the main dial, displaying chronograph and timing functions, edged with rose gold plating and white notches. The main watch dial itself is marked with rose gold batons to indicate the hours, standing out boldly against the white face and the slim black minute track that surrounds it. The slim rose gold tone watch hands also create a contrast against the design, ensuring the time can clearly be read. The watch face itself is protected by strong sapphire crystal glass, and features a square date window at four o’clock. The watch casing measures approximately 12.5mm in depth and 39mm in width. Hand crafted in Switzerland, this watch meets the Dreyfuss & Co. Seafarer Standard, which means that this timepiece is impervious to water and has a waterproof guarantee. Chapelle are proud and authorised stockists of Dreyfuss & Co. watches. This watch comes with a two year manufacturer’s warranty and will be sent in presentation packaging, making it an ideal investment piece or gift.
